hypothesis: Ensemble confidence scores predict accuracy

conclusion: Ensemble confidence is a valid quality signal
learnings: When methods agree → trust it
When methods disagree → query is ambiguous or methods all wrong
Can use confidence threshold (>60%) for filtering
